name: Dark Mode
description: Toggle between light and dark mode.

name: Open Source
description: View the source code on GitHub.

name: Live Chat
description: Chat with all the active users in real-time.

name: Custom Spotify API/Player
description: Get my current playing song on Spotify and play it on the website. I'm a huge music lover, so this was a must-have feature! This is custom made API also available on my GitHub/Npm registry.

name: Chromecast Support
description: Cast the website and Spotify audio to your Chromecast enabled devices.

name: Responsive Design
description: Optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

name: Interactive UI
description: Bento design with engaging animations and transitions.

name: PWA Support
description: Install as a Progressive Web App.
